pr_title: Add config property for min spark partition count

timeline.message:
Update Presto on Spark splits assignment test

Assertion does not hold after introducing property
`max_spark_input_partition_count_for_auto_tune` for auto tune.

timeline.bodyText: nit: perhaps also check minPartitionCount is at least 1?
timeline.author: wenleix

timeline.bodyText: I see. This essentially says, we only want to append to the existing partition if partitionCount is already large than minPartitionCount... Otherwise always create new partition.
